name: burden of the past
description:
Human has three time zones
Past, future and now
The darkness of the past and the light of the future feed the present

The second way describes past bitterness and occasional sweetness
The past has taught mankind lessons for centuries
People sometimes carry this burden and sometimes they are crushed under it
In the past, they dream of the future
That's why they always complement each other
The flow of time connects in the present
